name: Zugzwang
description:
> Explore an old manor where rooms change around you with every step. Space works in unexpected ways in here.

> Game by Ludipe with music by PianoFortress. Made for Gothic Novel Jam.

> The game probably needed more testing. Arrow keys and "X" is all you need to play. Fullscreen is highly encouraged (press F or click the button). Sound/music might take a bit to load.
